      • retrieveTasks

        public java.util.ArrayList<Task> retrieveTasks(org.joda.time.DateTime startDay,
                                      org.joda.time.DateTime endDay)
                                        throws InvalidDateRangeException
        Parameters:
        startDay - Start of the time range of the tasks you want
        endDay - End of the time range of the tasks you want
        Returns:
        An arraylist of all the tasks within a given date range. An empty arraylist will be returned if nothing is found.
        Throws:
        InvalidDateRangeException - endDay cannot be strictly earlier than startDay

      • retrieveTasks

        public java.util.ArrayList<Task> retrieveTasks(org.joda.time.DateTime startDay,
                                      org.joda.time.DateTime endDay,
                                      TaskType taskType)
                                        throws InvalidDateRangeException
        Parameters:
        startDay - Start of the time range of the tasks you want
        endDay - End of the time range of the tasks you want
        taskType - Only DeadlineTask, TimedTask and Floating task will be considered.
        Returns:
        An arraylist of a specific type of task within a given date range. An empty arraylist will be returned if nothing is found or the TaskType specified is incorrect.
        Throws:
        InvalidDateRangeException - endDay cannot be strictly earlier than startDay

      • retrieveAll

        public java.util.ArrayList<Task> retrieveAll()
        Returns:
        An arraylist of all the tasks in the system. An empty arraylist will be returned if nothing is found.

      • retrieveAll

        Parameters:
        taskType - Only DeadlineTask, TimedTask and Floating task will be considered.
        Returns:
        An arraylist of all the specific type of tasks in the system. An empty arraylist will be returned if nothing is found or if type of task is incorrect.
